text: Hagi nezmarera'a agaze'a omane monko a'kino, agra tusi agaze avu'avaza huno amu'enena hu'ne. Na'ankure agra ana a'mo'a huno, nagrama navesinentoa vene'neramimo'zama ne'zama, tima, sipisipi azokate kukenama, efeke kukenama, olivi masavema, wainima hu'za nami'naza vene'neramina zamavaririgahue huno hu'ne.
